name: Squat
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell across your upper back, bend your knees and hips to lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground, and push back up.

name: Leg Press
how_to: Sit on a leg press machine with your feet on the platform, lower the platform by bending your knees, and press it back up.

name: Lunge
how_to: Stand with feet together, step forward with one leg, lower your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle, and push back to the starting position.

name: Deadlift
how_to: Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip the barbell just outside your legs, lift the bar by extending your hips and knees, keeping your back straight.

name: Leg Curl
how_to: Lie face down on a leg curl machine, place your ankles under the pads, curl your legs up towards your buttocks, and slowly lower them back down.

name: Leg Extension
how_to: Sit on a leg extension machine, place your feet under the pads, extend your legs until they are straight, and slowly lower them back down.

name: Romanian Deadlift
how_to: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hold a barbell in front of your thighs, bend at the hips while keeping your legs mostly straight, lower the bar to mid-shin level, and return to the starting position.

name: Calf Raise
how_to: Stand on a calf raise machine or a step with your heels hanging off, raise your heels as high as possible, and lower them back down.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
how_to: Stand a few feet in front of a bench, place one foot on the bench behind you, lower your hips until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, and push back up.

name: Hip Thrust
how_to: Sit on the ground with your upper back against a bench, roll a barbell over your hips, thrust your hips upward by squeezing your glutes, and lower them back down.

name: Goblet Squat
how_to: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell close to your chest, squat down until your thighs are parallel to the ground, and stand back up.

name: Sumo Deadlift
how_to: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart and toes pointed out, grip the barbell with hands inside your knees, lift the bar by extending your hips and knees.

name: Step-Up
how_to: Stand in front of a bench or step, place one foot on the bench, push through your heel to lift your body up, and lower back down.

name: Box Jump
how_to: Stand in front of a sturdy box or platform, jump onto the box, landing with both feet, and step back down.
